column1: Kata Robata////Kata is easily my second favorite sushi place in Houston after Uchi. Our server
column3: was extremely personable and attentive. The foie nigiri and spicy soy ramen are my go to's every time I come. The pork belly with 60 degree egg
column5: and rising sun roll were stand outs. The wagyu nigiri
column7: and a salmon nigiri special for the night were also good but could probably skip for next time. Always great service and fresh sushi when I come.
